required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness, Safety, Adherence, and Health-related Quality of Life in HIV-1 Infected Adults Receiving Bictegravir/ Emtricitabine/Tenofovir Alafenamide (B/F/TAF)
clinical_study.official_title: Multi-center, Israeli, Non-interventional, Cohort Study of the Effectiveness, Safety, Adherence, and Health-related Quality of Life in HIV-1 Infected Adult Patients Receiving Bictegravir/ Emtricitabine/Tenofovir Alafenamide (B/F/TAF)

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate HIV-1 RNA suppression, defined as HIV-1 RNA < 50 copies/mL, at 12 months after initiating or switching to bictegravir/ emtricitabine/tenofovir alafenamide (B/F/TAF).

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with HIV-1 RNA Suppression (HIV RNA < 50 copies/mL) at 12 Months after Initiating or Switching to B/F/TAF

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with HIV-1 RNA Suppression (HIV RNA < 50 copies/mL) at 3 Months After Initiating or Switching to B/F/TAF
Proportion of Participants with HIV-1 RNA Suppression (HIV RNA < 50 copies/mL) at 6 Months After Initiating or Switching to B/F/TAF
Percentage of Participants with HIV-1 RNA Suppression (HIV RNA < 50 copies/mL) at 24 Months After Initiating or Switching to B/F/TAF
Change in CD4 Cell Count at 3 Months After Initiating or Switching to B/F/TAF
Change in CD4 Cell Count at 6 Months After Initiating or Switching to B/F/TAF
Change in CD4 Cell Count at 12 Months After Initiating or Switching to B/F/TAF
Change in CD4 Cell Count at 24 Months After Initiating or Switching to B/F/TAF
CD4/CD8 Ratio at 3 Months After Initiating or Switching to B/F/TAF
CD4/CD8 Ratio at 6 Months After Initiating or Switching to B/F/TAF
CD4/CD8 Ratio at 12 Months After Initiating or Switching to B/F/TAF
CD4/CD8 Ratio at 24 Months After Initiating or Switching to B/F/TAF
Percentage of Participants Experiencing Adverse Events and Serious Adverse Events

arm_group.description: HIV-1 infected adults who initiate B/F/TAF therapy

intervention.description: B/F/TAF administered in accordance with the approved product monograph

study_pop.textblock: The study population will be comprised of antiretroviral therapy (ART)-naïve and ART-experienced HIV-1 infected adults aged ≥ 18 years initiating treatment with B/F/TAF in routine clinical care in Israel.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- HIV-1 infection
- Signed informed consent
- Initiating treatment with B/F/TAF
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participation in any interventional clinical trial
